channel.title: Switching npc direction
channel.description: ok this is really aggrivating lol, and i finnaly know how to code and i coded a brand new home but anyway the npc keep spawning south and i want them to face where the players spawn wich is west, if anyone knows how to do it plz reply (oh and btw i couldnt find it on search so this is why im asking you)
